item.title: HTTP/3 Benchmarks: QUIC Performance on Lossy Networks with Packet Analysis
item.description: HTTP/3 replaces TCP+TLS with QUIC, claiming to solve “head-of-line blocking”. But how does it actually perform? This post uses simulated degraded networks to compare HTTP/2 and HTTP/3 with real data.
